casebody.data:
Leo STOLLER, Appellant, v. UNEX CORP., Appellee. No. 03-1123. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Dec. 5, 2003.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, MICHEL, and SCHALL, Circuit Judges. Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
